description: Spearheading the development of a robust safety module front-end to proactively mitigate fraudulent activities on the platform, demonstrating a commitment to safeguarding user trust and maintaining the platform's integrity.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to optimize and enhance various micro front-ends, thereby ensuring seamless product support and delivering exceptional user experiences.
Write modern, performant, and robust code for a diverse array of client and internal projects
Work with a variety of different languages and frameworks such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, NestJs etc.
Communicate and collaborate with multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, managers, clients, and stakeholders on a daily basis

Created Dashboard application which tracks, gathers, and displays business data in interactive and customizable visualizations. The application is used by executives to monitor and analyze the customer service experience.
Developed, Tested and deployed dashboard application that displays the sales, pricing and prediction data in real time. Optimized and scaled the application to handle the big data.
Created a chat-bot UI for the internal website that dynamically serves response for the users.
Developed and deployed the application which digitalized the Changi Airport workplace.
Created a web-based content management system that is used to create Online courses for the employees of the firm. Implemented the business logic, modules and cross-browser compatibility using React.
Developed, tested and deployed cross-platform Online learning mobile application InterviewReady that helps students prepare for exams.
Collaborated with Product Designers, Product Managers, and Software Engineers to deliver compelling user-facing products.
Developed a Survey Software that captures and transforms paper-based system into smart digital checklists. Created web-based application using Angular and mobile application using PhongeGap.
Developed custom modules for the application and Cordova plugins for the mobile application.
Developed a sales mobile application that helps salesman and executives with their invoices and lead generation
Developed and designed the UI using Sencha Touch, DOJO. Created Mobile Application using PhoneGap.
